class_participation.policy: One absence allowed with no penalty; each additional absence reduces final course grade by 1% unless approved.

in_class_discussions.policy: Raising/answering questions and participating in discussions.

homework_assignments.submission: Moodle (MS Word or PDF); in special situations via email to the course instructor.
homework_assignments.late_policy: 20% deduction if late unless prior instructor approval is obtained.

notes: Work with the instructor to decide the project/essay topic.
You are encouraged (not required) to use the NeurIPS 2025 LaTeX template for the proposal/report.
